election_record.label: Massachusetts 1819 Maine Separation

overview.note: July 26, 1819 was set as the date for voting on the question of separation.
September 20, 1819 was set as the election date for delegates to an impending Constitutional Convention, which would convene on October 11, 1819.

sub_unit.name: Baldwin
sub_unit.note: The American Advocate and Kennebec Advertiser (Hallowell, ME), The Eastern Argus (Portland, ME) and Hallowell Gazette (Hallowell, ME) list 23 Nay votes in Baldwin.
